text: GIAN Course on, "Construction Pollution and Management" was held during 12/02/2018 to 16/02/2018 at National Institute of Technology Karnataka. This course was delivered by Prof. Prashant Kumar, Professor, from University of Surrey, United Kingdom and it was sanctioned by Ministry of Human Resource Development (MHRD).

GIAN Course on, "Concrete: Microstructure Characterization" was held during 18/06/2018 to 22/06/2018 at National Institute of Technology Karnataka. This course was delivered by Prof. Narayanan Neithalath, Professor, Arizona State University, United States of America and it was sanctioned by Ministry of Human Resource Development (MHRD).

GIAN Course on, "Whole Life Management of Concrete Structures" was held during 10/09/2018 to 14/09/2018 at National Institute of Technology Karnataka. This course was delivered by Dr. Sreejith Nanukuttan, Senior Lecturer, Queen’s University of Belfast, United Kingdom, and it was sanctioned by Ministry of Human Resource Development (MHRD).

GIAN Course on, "Design of Concrete Structures Reinforced with Fiber Reinforced Polymer (FRP) Bars" was held during 29th July – 2nd August 2019 at National Institute of Technology Karnataka. This course was delivered by Dr. Anil K Patnaik, Professor, University of Akron, Ohio, United States of America, and it was sanctioned by Ministry of Human Resource Development (MHRD).
